mapper.select: select bc.*, bc.no, bc.content, (select COUNT(*) from board_comment_like WHERE comment_no = bc.no) as like_count, (select COUNT(*) from board_comment_dislike WHERE comment_no = bc.no) as dislike_count from board left join board_comment bc on board.no = bc.board_no WHERE board.no = #{board_no} and bc.recomment is null AND bc.no is not null;

select board_comment.*, (SELECT COUNT(comment_no) AS cnt FROM board_comment_like where board_comment_like.comment_no = board_comment.no GROUP BY comment_no) as count from board_comment where board_no = #{board_no} and recomment is null order by count desc limit 1;
select EXISTS(select * from question_comment WHERE no = #{last_comment_no})

SET @LAST_COMMENT_LIKES_COUNT = (select COUNT(*) from question_comment_like WHERE comment_no = #{last_comment_no}); select qc.no, qc.question_no, qc.content, (select COUNT(*) from question_comment_like WHERE comment_no = qc.no) as like_count from question_comment qc WHERE question_no = #{content_no} AND qc.is_blocked = false AND recomment is null AND ((select COUNT(*) from question_comment_like WHERE comment_no = qc.no) < @LAST_COMMENT_LIKES_COUNT OR ((select COUNT(*) from question_comment_like WHERE comment_no = qc.no) = @LAST_COMMENT_LIKES_COUNT AND qc.no > #{last_comment_no})) order by like_count DESC, qc.no LIMIT 5;
